en: Hi! This is a TipBot for Sirius.
You can use it to share Sirius in Telegram.
This Bot allows you to receive, store and send Sirius on Telegram.
To get started, use /address or /deposit _in private_ to display your Telegram wallet address.
Useful if you want to receive Sirius directly to your Telegram wallet.
Use /balance to display the balance of your Telegram wallet.
Use `/tip <user> <amount>` to send Sirius to another user.
Make sure to correctly tag the person you are tipping.
If you want to send Sirius to all active members of a group, use: `/rain <amount> [count]`.
Important: `amount` will be sent to each member, and it will NOT be shared among them.
Make sure to rain more than the minimum amount, and on enough members.
To withdraw your balance, use `/withdraw <address> <amount>`
Please verify your address before submitting, as we can not undo this process.
If you need more help click the button below to see the TipBot documentation:
Documentation
https://docs.getsirius.io/docs/faq/tipbot-telegram
You can't ask this in public!
Please click the button below:
HELP
There are no fees to use this bot except the automatic daemon fee.
Under no circumstances the Sirius team. will be held responsible for lost, stolen or misdirected funds.
You can't ask this in public!
